49.eng-name: The Book of the Etiquette of Judges

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Al-Fadl bin 'Abbas, that:He was riding behind the Messenger of Allah [SAW], when a man came and said: "O Messenger of Allah, my mother is an old woman; if I put her on a mount she cannot sit firmly, and if I tie her, I fear that I may kill her." He said: "Do you think that if your mother owed a debt you would pay it off for her?" He said: "Yes." He said: "Then perform Hajj on behalf of your mother

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى يَحْيَى بْنِ أَبِي إِسْحَاقَ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the Different Reports from Yahya Ibn Abi Ishaq
